url.title: Apollo.io List URL
url.description: The URL of the Apollo.io list you want to scrape. Must be a valid Apollo.io list URL (e.g., https://app.apollo.io/#/people?...)

numberOfPages.title: Number of Pages
numberOfPages.description: How many pages to scrape (max 100). Each page typically contains 25 contacts.

timeBetweenPages.title: Time Between Pages (seconds)
timeBetweenPages.description: Delay in seconds between scraping each page to avoid rate limiting.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for the scraper. Using proxies is recommended to avoid being blocked.
